Ce jeu est une représentation idéaliste du conflit moderne qu'est la lutte contre le terrorisme, une vision qui se floute à chaque fois que mon curseur est sur l'ennemie et QUE jE n'ArrIve Pas a lE tOuCher... un des meilleurs jeu que j'ai pu experimenter, mais mal développé. Peut mieux faire. 5/20

match making still sucks this long into the game. teammates can litterall kick themselves to a 2vX and if you are on the 2 will kick you into competitive cooldown. the only way to progress is to get into 3rd party matchmaking thats makes the actual matchmaking system totally irrelevant. if you want to play for real you have to go out of your way to play the game,

Jogo muito bom e viciante, nem um pouco parecido com seus antecessores porém tem mais prós do que contras. Depois que ficou gratuito aumentou bastante o numero de hackers, mas não é algo que atrapalhe o jogo por completo pois ainda é raro encontrar um cheater.

Outdated game. This game was released 10 years ago, but looks 20 years old. The community is utterly toxic, especially for new players. The skin system is extremely toxic - if you pay 0 cash, you get 0 skins. Sounds logical, but most games handle it different. The anti cheat is terribly bad and not at all up to date.

Only upside to this game is the insanely good balancing and insanely good game concept. If you reading this dont even pick this game up. Play Valorant instead.
